post.body: Miss you guys too...I wish I could be there. I'll call ya' as soon as I'm done here and you can fill me in on stuff!
Marsha...I think you may be right about that! How's the party!?
You are so delusional...this is the Rack - why would it be any different from October and November and the other 10 months!?
Dear Master Chen...exactly how much caffeine can I consume in one day and still keep my inner "chi" functional?
It's such an accomplishment when you finish a sock - and even greater when the 2nd is done (havent dont that yet). congrats!
What happened!? Hope you're not in much pain and it they heal quickly!
What happ
thanks! I think you wouldve liked the third song I had planned to play as well. Maybe next year!
Ahhhh the public snicker...comes with the secure laughter'
Awesomeness, girlfriend! I hope those thieves have a lifetime of bad hair days just for what they've done!
You gotta know the secret knock too...
you
My condolences on the passing of your laptop (and data). We should have a service for your laptop and my iPod...
I hope the outcome of mine is as good as yours! You totally know how I feel! Abysmal! But happy yours made it!
What a long first day! Hope you have a quiet night!
Thanks...prognosis is not good :( Then again, I'm not a Genius (or a surgeon).
Awesome that we can bring our kids to work! My little one loves it here!
Funny you don't ever think about how good you want a phlebotomist to be till you have to ante up your arm!
More crazy then dedicated, probably!
Haven't seen Wicked. Bought the book but haven't really given it a chance. I need to read it though. I heard it was excellent.
He's so CUTE! I love how Jackson is awake in every single photo and Stonewall is crashed! Conor seems to love him!
Now that would be "a horse of a different color!"
If shopping came with belts, I'd be a black belt. I'm a ninja shopper. Some people work out, I shop!
I think I'm on the downhill slope...almost the end of a loooong workday (everybody cheer)!
Tegan & Sara...take me home (please?!)..."You Wouldn't Like Me" (I don't like me right now cuz I'm missing my Mom's b-day cuz of WORK)! Fail
Everybody say "wheee" as we climb the steep rollercoaster hill...& get ready to feel the pit of your stomach in your throat. Monday's thrill
Mama Lee's green beans FTW! They're the best thing that's happened to me all day! Lots o love (no spackle) for Mama Lee's Soul Food!
I'm likin' the word "spackle." I like saying it - with a new twist..."come near me with another project and I'm gonna SPACKLE you!"
One of those weeks that mandate caffeine all day every day. WTF is up with the weather? I thought we were supposed to have another warm day!
Where to shop today...yesterday was la cantera. today? San Marcos? Austin? Forum?
whee
Feet hurt - princess shoes aren't very comfy. Need my glass slippers.
Puppy just yacked! Yuuuck!
Got an awesome early Christmas present! An iPhone which I'm playing with now!
At DSW...shoes...ahhhh!
Time to get busy - folded laundry, about to do dishes then I'm headed out!
iPod is broken. Feels like someone stabbed me in the heart. I'm performing cardiac rescue on it in hopes it will come back to me.
OUT of planning meeting...ahhhhhh...that's better. Almost time to commune with communications peeps (should be fun).
In planning meeting - can't believe we have to start writing 2009 on everything soon. I should start practicing now.
I'm at work on my day off. Does that seem wrong to anyone else? I must be really freakin stupid or dedicated...or *gulp* a workaholic?!
